Description.Text:
Hotel Imperiale Taormina, with its panoramic views, is located in the old centre of Taormina, about 80 metres from Corso Umberto I and the Palacongressi (where the International Film Festival is hosted), and about 200 metres from the ancient Greek Theatre. The hotel has just reopened this past August 2009 following a massive refurbishment.
Set higher than other buildings in the town centre in a unique panoramic position, from the Hotel Imperiale its guests enjoy outstanding views of the Greek theatre in the foreground and a backdrop of the sea, stretching from Capo S. Alessio as far as the Bay of Naxos.
Its fresh contemporary design makes of this new five star hotel a protagonist of Taormina scene.
Refurbishment was done in total respect for local style and materials including lava stone, which was used extensively and was adapted to contemporary demands, true to the philosophy that typifies all Exclusive Hotel Collection properties.
All 63 guestrooms feature rosewood furniture and some suites have their own panoramic terrace, with outdoor whirlpool and steam bath.
A panoramic outdoor pool and a roof garden spoil guests with their stunning views.
This 5-star hotel completes its offer with an exclusive 260 sqm SPA, the Amphitheatre restaurant with its own VIP dining room serving traditional Sicilian cuisine, and conference facilities for up to 200 attendees.
Contemporary luxury 5 star Hotel, centrally located in a panoramic
position over the Naxos Bay and downtown Taormina.
Senses and Spirit are mesmerized by Terrace Suite with private Jacuzzi, overlooking the breathtaking view over the bay, the Greek theatre and the gardens of Taormina. Guests dive in water and light thanks to the lobby in glass and local lavic stone with windows peering on the swimming pool.
Smooth, clean design attitude, free wireless in public area and rooms feel easy and relax.
Spa, fitness, Treatments zone around the swimming area offer a Mediterranean wellness from an outstanding point of view: over See, History, Flora and Fauna. Property also offers Airport transfer - at cost, Baby sitting service - at cost, Doctor on call - at cost, Dry cleaning - at cost, Lobby, Plunge pool, Reception and Smoke-free hotel.

In Deluxe Mountain View Rooms additional bed and baby cot are not available.
